actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 93-725.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain mineral rights in certain lands located in Utah to the record owner thereof.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to sell mineral rights in specified lands located in Utah County, Utah to the record owner thereof.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain mineral rights in certain lands located in Utah to the record owner thereof.
